season.description: must be a string and is required

gameDate.description: must be a date if the field exists

country_id.description: must be a string and is required

country_name.description: must be a string and is required

league_id.description: must be a string and is required

league_name.description: must be a string and is required

birthday.description: must be a string or null

height.description: must be a double in centimeters or null

weight.description: must be an int or null

player_name.description: must be a string and is required

homeOrAway.description: must be a string and is required

team_id.description: must be a string and is required

long_name.description: must be a string and is required

short_name.description: must be a string and is required

goals.description: must be an int and is required
